skills.label: Adjust views
items: Adjust views by using ribbon or status bar commands

skills.label: Manipulate the PowerPoint window
items: Work with multiple presentation windows simultaneously

skills.label: Configure the Quick Access Toolbar (QAT)
items: Show the qat below the ribbon

skills.label: Configure PowerPoint file options
items: Use powerpoint, proofing, and save options

skills.label: Construct and edit photo albums
items: Add captions to pictures, insert text, insert images in black and white, reorder pictures in an album, and adjust image rotation, brightness, and contrast

skills.label: Apply slide size and orientation settings
items: Set up a custom size, and change the orientation

skills.label: Add and remove slides
items: Insert an outline, reuse slides from a saved presentation, reuse slides from a slide library, duplicate selected slides, delete multiple slides simultaneously, and include non-contiguous slides in a presentation

skills.label: Format slides
items: Format sections
Modify themes
Switch to a different slide layout
Apply a fill color, gradient, picture, texture, or pattern to a slide
And set up slide footers

skills.label: Enter and format text
items: Use text effects
Change the indentation, alignment, line spacing, and direction of text
Change the formatting of bulleted and numbered lists
Enter text in a placeholder text box
Convert text to smartart
Copy and paste text
Use paste special, and use format painter

skills.label: Format text boxes
items: Apply a fill color, gradient, picture, texture, or pattern to a text box
Change the outline color, weight, or style
Change the shape of the text box
Apply effects
Set the alignment
Create columns in a text box
Set internal margins
Set the current text box formatting as the default for new text boxes
Adjust text wrapping
Size and position a text box and use autofit

label: Work with graphical and multimedia elements

skills.label: Manipulate graphical elements
items: Arrange, position, and resize graphical elements
Apply effects, styles, and borders
And add hyperlinks

skills.label: Manipulate images
items: Apply color adjustments and image corrections (sharpen, soften, brightness, contrast), add artistic effects to an image, remove a background, crop a picture, compress selected pictures or all pictures, change a picture, and reset a picture

skills.label: Modify WordArt and shapes
items: Set the formatting of the current shape as the default for future shapes, change the fill color or texture, change the wordart, convert to smartart

skills.label: Manipulate SmartArt
items: Add and remove shapes, change smartart styles, change the smartart layout, reorder shapes, convert a smartart graphic to text, convert smartart to shapes, make shapes larger or smaller, and promote or demote bullet levels

skills.label: Edit video and audio content
items: Apply a style to video or audio content
Adjust, arrange, and size video or audio content
And adjust playback options

skills.label: Construct and modify tables
items: Draw a table
Insert an excel spreadsheet
Set table style options
Add shading, borders, and effects
Change the alignment
Resize, merge, or split columns and rows
Distribute and arrange columns and rows

skills.label: Insert and modify charts
items: Select a chart type, enter chart data, change the chart type, change the chart layout, switch row and column, select and edit data

skills.label: Apply chart elements
items: Use chart labels, axes, gridlines, and backgrounds

skills.label: Manipulate chart layouts
items: Select chart elements, and format selections

skills.label: Manipulate chart elements
items: Arrange chart elements, specify a precise position, apply effects, resize chart elements, apply quick styles, apply a border, and add hyperlinks

skills.label: Apply built-in and custom animations
items: Use more entrance, more emphasis, and more exit effects, and use more motion paths

skills.label: Apply effect and path options
items: Set timing and start options

skills.label: Apply and modify transitions between slides
items: Modify a transition effect, add a sound to a transition, modify transition duration, and set up manual or automatically timed advance options

skills.label: Manipulate animations
items: Change the direction of an animation, attach a sound to an animation, use animation painter, reorder animations, and select text options

skills.label: Manage comments in presentations
items: Insert and edit comments, show or hide markup, move to the previous or next comment, and delete comments

skills.label: Apply proofing tools
items: Use spelling and thesaurus features, compare and combine presentations

skills.label: Save presentations
items: Save the presentation as a picture presentation, portable document format (pdf) file, xml paper specification (xps), outline, or opendocument presentation, save a slide or object as a picture file, and save a presentation as a show (.ppsx)

skills.label: Share presentations
items: Package a presentation for cd delivery, create video, create handouts (send to word), and compress media

skills.label: Print presentations
items: Adjust print settings

skills.label: Protect presentations
items: Set a password, change a password, and mark a presentation as final

skills.label: Apply presentation tools
items: Add pen and highlighter annotations, change the ink color, erase an annotation, and discard or retain annotations upon closing

skills.label: Set up slide shows
items: Set up slide show, play narrations, set up presenter view, use timings, show media controls, broadcast presentations, and create a custom slide show

skills.label: Set presentation timing
items: Rehearse and keep timings, adjust a slide's timing

skills.label: Record presentations
items: Start recording from the beginning of a slide show, start recording from the current slide of the slide show
